title: crashes in champ select
body: it has happened 3 times today. I've never had this happen to me before....any fixes? losing lots of lp and the 30 min waits are really getting frustrating. pls help.

replies.body:
This is likely caused by a drop in your connection to the matchmaking servers. Most of the time, local network settings are to blame for these issues, so I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

Windows 10 user with recent Windows10 Anniversary update? Try this:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
Hey, Hyperion. This fix you linked only works for crashes after entering the game or fps-related issue. Anything related to crashes in champ select would be caused by connection problems.
